languages.text: "Младший офицер... что за нашивки на нем были?.. Не помню. Час назад или около того. Мне не спалось, и я решил занять себя делом... пошел в место, где в прошлый раз видел отметки..." {n}Хейнрикс сбивается, вновь с сипом втягивая в себя воздух.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Младший офицер... что за нашивки на нем были?.. Не помню. Час назад или около того. Мне не спалось, и я решил занять себя делом... пошел в место, где в прошлый раз видел отметки..." {n}Хейнрикс сбивается, вновь с сипом втягивая в себя воздух.{/n}

languages.text: "A junior officer... What stripes was he wearing? I can't remember. It happened an hour ago or thereabouts. I couldn't sleep, so I decided to do something to occupy myself... I went to the place where I'd seen the marks last time..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, taking in ragged gulps of air once more.{/n}

I went to the place where I'd seen the marks last time..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, taking in ragged gulps of air once more.{/n}

languages.text: “那是位下级军官……他的军衔是什么来着？我记不清了。那大概是一个小时之前的事情。发生那件事情之后，我根本无法入睡，于是我决定做些什么来打发时间……我去了之前看到那些痕迹的地方……”{n}海因里希顿了顿，再次大口喘着粗气。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A junior officer... What stripes was he wearing? I can't remember. It happened an hour ago or thereabouts. I couldn't sleep, so I decided to do something to occupy myself... I went to the place where I'd seen the marks last time..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, taking in ragged gulps of air once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那是位下级军官……他的军衔是什么来着？我记不清了。那大概是一个小时之前的事情。发生那件事情之后，我根本无法入睡，于是我决定做些什么来打发时间……我去了之前看到那些痕迹的地方……”{n}海因里希顿了顿，再次大口喘着粗气。{/n}

languages.text: «Un oficial de bajo rango... ¿Qué galones llevaba? No recuerdo. Fue hace una hora, aproximadamente. No podía dormir, así que había decidido hacer algo para entretenerme... He ido al lugar donde había visto las marcas la última vez...». {n}Heinrix se interrumpe para coger aire a bocanadas otra vez.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A junior officer... What stripes was he wearing? I can't remember. It happened an hour ago or thereabouts. I couldn't sleep, so I decided to do something to occupy myself... I went to the place where I'd seen the marks last time..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, taking in ragged gulps of air once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Un oficial de bajo rango... ¿Qué galones llevaba? No recuerdo. Fue hace una hora, aproximadamente. No podía dormir, así que había decidido hacer algo para entretenerme... He ido al lugar donde había visto las marcas la última vez...». {n}Heinrix se interrumpe para coger aire a bocanadas otra vez.{/n}

languages.text: 「下士官か…どんな袖章を身に着けていた？思い出せない。1時間前かそこらの出来事だった。眠れなかったので、何か気晴らしをしようと思って…前回マークを見た場所に行ったんだ…」{n}ハインリックスはもう一度、荒い息を吸い込みながら言葉を切った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A junior officer... What stripes was he wearing? I can't remember. It happened an hour ago or thereabouts. I couldn't sleep, so I decided to do something to occupy myself... I went to the place where I'd seen the marks last time..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, taking in ragged gulps of air once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「下士官か…どんな袖章を身に着けていた？思い出せない。1時間前かそこらの出来事だった。眠れなかったので、何か気晴らしをしようと思って…前回マークを見た場所に行ったんだ…」{n}ハインリックスはもう一度、荒い息を吸い込みながら言葉を切った。{/n}

languages.text: « Un sous-officier... Quel était son grade ? Je ne saurais vous le dire. C'est arrivé il y a environ une heure. Je n'arrivais pas à dormir, alors j'ai voulu faire quelque chose pour m'occuper... Je suis allé là où j'avais vu les marques la dernière fois... » {n}Heinrix s'interrompt et, une fois de plus, sembler peiner à inspirer ne serait-ce qu'une petite goulée d'air.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A junior officer... What stripes was he wearing? I can't remember. It happened an hour ago or thereabouts. I couldn't sleep, so I decided to do something to occupy myself... I went to the place where I'd seen the marks last time..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, taking in ragged gulps of air once more.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Un sous-officier... Quel était son grade ? Je ne saurais vous le dire. C'est arrivé il y a environ une heure. Je n'arrivais pas à dormir, alors j'ai voulu faire quelque chose pour m'occuper... Je suis allé là où j'avais vu les marques la dernière fois... » {n}Heinrix s'interrompt et, une fois de plus, sembler peiner à inspirer ne serait-ce qu'une petite goulée d'air.{/n}

languages.text: "Ein Junior-Offizier ... Welche Streifen hat er getragen? Ich kann mich nicht erinnern. Das war vor einer Stunde oder so. Ich konnte nicht schlafen, also wollte ich irgendwas tun, um mich zu beschäftigen ... Ich begab mich zu dem Ort, wo ich die Spuren das letzte Mal gesehen hatte ..." {n}Heinrix hält inne und schnappt erneut tief nach Luft.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A junior officer... What stripes was he wearing? I can't remember. It happened an hour ago or thereabouts. I couldn't sleep, so I decided to do something to occupy myself... I went to the place where I'd seen the marks last time..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, taking in ragged gulps of air once more.{/n}

I went to the place where I'd seen the marks last time..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, taking in ragged gulps of air once more.{/n}

languages.text: "Kıdemsiz bir subay... Rütbesi neydi acaba? Hatırlayamıyorum. Aşağı yukarı bir saat önce oldu. Uyuyamadım, ben de kendimi meşgul edecek bir şey yapmaya karar verdim... İşaretleri en son gördüğüm yere gittim..." {n}Heinrix duraksıyor, bir kez daha düzensiz bir şekilde yutkunarak nefes alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A junior officer... What stripes was he wearing? I can't remember. It happened an hour ago or thereabouts. I couldn't sleep, so I decided to do something to occupy myself... I went to the place where I'd seen the marks last time..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, taking in ragged gulps of air once more.{/n}
